title: Michael McCaul
deleted: ===Endangering passengers on a plane during COVID-19===
On 04 October 2020, Mike Siegel, a US House candidate tweeted a video on which Michael McCaul is seen flying without a facial mask:

{{Cite tweet |user=SiegelForTexas |number=1312480303789694977 |date = 4 October 2020 |title=This is my opponent in #TX10, Rep. McCaul. Refusing to wear a mask on a commuter flight. Endangering passengers and staff alike. This absolute disregard for human life is not unusual for him — it’s true to form. We remove him on November 3. }} <ref>https://mobile.twitter.com/siegelfortexas/status/1312480303789694977</ref>
